The lowest energy conformers in COS-0,1 are grouped near Θ = 0, which corresponds to the vertical orientation of the Sc–N or Y–N bond remotely from the Ni(OEP)-coordination site of the fullerene cage ( Fig. 2c and d). Two other Sc–N bonds are oriented towards the Ni(OEP) molecule. This orientation of the endohedral cluster corresponds to the experimentally observed orientation in M 3N@C 80·Ni(OEP) crystals.
